title: Recommendation 3.2: Preventive Measures I (Effects of Drugs on POD prevention) - Preventive dexmedetomidine administration intra- or postoperative

status: draft

date: 2024-02

citedArtifact

identifier: 37599617-rec3.2

*Primary title (Title Type#primary)English (Tags for the Identification of Languages#en)Recommendation 3.2

Parts

-TypeValue
*paragraphs (Cited Artifact Part Type#paragraphs)When dexmedetomidine is used intra- or postoperatively with the aim to prevent POD, we recommend balancing the expected benefits against the most important side effects (bradycardia and hypotension).

-TypeResource
*contained-inUpdate of the European Society of Anaesthesiology and Intensive Care Medicine evidence-based and consensus-based guideline on postoperative delirium in adult patients
